2025-0796
2025-11-13JUSOther Than Statutory AuthorityAppointment of a Judge of the Superior Court for Quebec for the District of MontréalAppointment of Alexandre-Philippe Avard of the city of Montréal in the Province of Quebec, Barrister-at-law, to be a Judge of the Superior Court for Quebec for the District of Montréal, with residence in the territory of Ville de Montréal or in the immediate vicinity thereof.N/A
subject: Appointment of a Judge of the Superior Court for Quebec for the District of Montréal
precis: Appointment of Alexandre-Philippe Avard of the city of Montréal in the Province of Quebec, Barrister-at-law, to be a Judge of the Superior Court for Quebec for the District of Montréal, with residence in the territory of Ville de Montréal or in the immediate vicinity thereof.
